metadata.title: CVE-2021-46239 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The binary MP4Box in GPAC v1.1.0 was discovered to contain an invalid free vulnerability via the function gf_free () at utils/alloc.c. This vulnerability can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
